turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can I assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Today I need your help ordering coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to get a Cherry Mocha with added honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I will like little cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So a Cherry Mocha with honey, 2% milk and whipped cream. Correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up in Downtown Wichita.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the Starbucks in Downtown Wichita.
